heading: Sins of the Horadrim Season Tier List Updates
content: Season 9: Sins of the Horadrim is live for a few weeks now! As usual, we've done a complete overhaul of our tier lists. This time around we heavily rescaled our tiering system. Take a look at our new and updated tier lists to get an idea of how your build stacks up for leveling, endgame, and speedfarming in the current season! Are you ready ? Check out now our Sins of the Horadrim Season Tier List Updates! We hope you enjoy the Sins of the Horadrim Season with the aid of our Season 9 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 9 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 9 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
